Leiden - Boston, E.J. Brill, 2013, 8°, xiv-318 pp., 3 figg. ISBN 978-90-04-21858-1. €110.
Preface. - 1. Greeks and Egyptians. - 2. Medicine and the gods. - 3. Theoretical perspectives. - 4. Responses to illness. - 5. Identifying medical practitioners. - 6. Medicine in Alexandria.

C.R. par Michaela Senkova, BMCRev < http://bmcr.brynmawr.edu/2013/2013-09-48.html >. - Susan A. Stefens, BASP 52 (2015) pp. 375-377. - Nick West, JHS 134 (2014) pp. 214-215. - Bronwen L. Wickkiser, Aestimatio 11 (2014) pp. 227-231 < http://www.ircps.org/aestimatio/11/227-231 >.
